main.input

Class ProjectService

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.input.ProjectService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Subject

    @Service
public class ProjectService
extends java.lang.Object
implements Subject
    This class provides the logic which RESTHandler calls upon to deliver its functionality. It relies on the ProjectSerializer class for storing and fetching Projects.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ProjectService()
      Creates a default ProjectService object.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ProjectService

        public ProjectService()
        Creates a default ProjectService object. If previously stored projects are available, they are loaded into the object.

    • Method Detail

      • createProject

        public Project createProject()
        Creates a new Project.
        Returns:
        A new Project with a default empty Canvas.
        See Also:
        Project

      • getProject

        public Project getProject(java.lang.String projectID)
        Returns the Project with the given ID.
        Parameters:
        projectID - The project ID.
        Returns:
        The Project with the given ID.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If a Project with the given ID does not exist.

      • addLayerGroup

        public void addLayerGroup(Project project,
                          RequestAddLayerGroup request)
        Adds a layer to the given Project.
        Parameters:
        project - The Project to add a layer to.
        request - The RequestAddLayerGroup object containing the values for the modification.

      • addShape

        public void addShape(Project project,
                     RequestAddShape request)
              throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Adds a Shape of the specified type to the specified Project.
        Parameters:
        project - The Project to add the Shape to.
        request - The RequestAddShape object containing the values for the modification.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the shape type could not be resolved or the element ID after which to insert the Shape does not exist.

      • editProject

        public void editProject(Project project,
                        RequestEditProject request)
        Modifies the width, height or both of the canvas of a Project. Also allows setting whether to allow the HTML "transform" attribute on elements.
        Parameters:
        project - The Project to modify.
        request - The RequestEditProject object containing the values for the modification.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the width or height is negative.

      • editElement

        public void editElement(Project project,
                        RequestEditElement request)
        Sets the visibility of a given Element.
        Parameters:
        project - The Project to edit.
        request - The RequestEditElement object containing the values for the modification.

      • modifyShape

        public void modifyShape(Project project,
                        RequestModifyShape request)
        Modifies a shape within a given layer of the canvas.
        Parameters:
        project - The Project to modify.
        request - The RequestModifyShape object containing the values for the modification.

      • transformElement

        public void transformElement(Project project,
                             RequestTransformElement request)
        Modifies the visual representation of a shape within a certain layer using the SVG format's inbuilt transform parameters.
        Parameters:
        project - The Project to modify.
        request - The RequestTransformElement object containing the values for the modification.

      • removeElement

        public void removeElement(Project project,
                          RequestRemoveElement request)
        Deletes a layer from the specified canvas.
        Parameters:
        project - The Project to delete the layer from.
        request - The RequestRemoveElement object containing the values for the modification.

      • getDownloadResponseForType

        public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.Object> getDownloadResponseForType(Project project,
                                                                                            DownloadFormat format)
                                                                                     throws java.io.IOException,
                                                                                            org.apache.batik.transcoder.TranscoderException
        Downloads a picture of the canvas in a format of choice.
        Parameters:
        project - Is used to retrieve the canvas based on the ID.
        format - Specifies the desired file format.
        Returns:
        A SVG, JPG or PNG file, which represents the canvas at the time of convert.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the download format could not be resolved.
        java.io.IOException - If an I/O error occurs.
        org.apache.batik.transcoder.TranscoderException - If transcoding to the desired image format fails.

      • getProjects

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,Project> getProjects()
        Returns a Map containing the Project IDs and respective Projects.
        Returns:
        A Map containing the Project IDs and respective Projects.
